name: Color React
description:
Good day!

Hello, this is another game of mine inspired on games that improves your reaction time! Have fun!

Goal:
  • to tap the corresponding colors that is shown.
  • to score as many as you can.
  • to have fun!
Mechanics: 
  • Use your mouse to choose and click the corresponding color.
  • Press "Escape" Key or click the target color to pause the game.
Features:
  • Has three types that will definitely challenge you.
  • Amazing music!
  • Keep track of your high score and tell your friends that they can't beat you!

Credits:
